mapper.select: select * from public."apiDetails" order by id asc;

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", ad."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where "apisId" = #{apisId};

select r."apisId", r.id as resource_id, ad.id, ad."resourceId", ad.method, ad.url, ad.uri, ad.summary, r.garbage, ad.security, ad.scope, ad."operationId", ad.version, ad.status, ad."authorization", ad."tagId", ad.trash from public.resource as r join public."apiDetails" as ad on ad."resourceId" = r."id" where ad.id = #{id};
select * from public."apiDetails" inner join public.resource on public.resource.id = public."apiDetails"."resourceId" where public.resource."apisId" = #{apisId};

select public."apiDetails".id,"apisId", public.resource.id as resource_id, garbage, method, url, uri, summary, security, scope, "operationId", version, status, "authorization", "tagId", trash, "resourceId" from public."apiDetails" inner join public.resource on public.resource.id = public."apiDetails"."resourceId" order by public."apiDetails".id asc
mapper.update: UPDATE public."apiDetails" SET method=#{method}, url=#{url}, uri=#{uri}, summary=#{summary}, security=#{security}, scope=#{scope}, "operationId"=#{operationId}, version=#{version}, status=#{status}, "authorization"=#{authorization}, "tagId"=#{tagId}, trash=#{trash}, "resourceId"=#{resourceId} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: select re."apisId", re.id, re.garbage, ap.context from public.resource as re join public.apis as ap on ap.id = re."apisId" order by re.id asc
SELECT id, method,uri FROM public."apiDetails" where uri ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword},'%') and trash = false order by id;
